scripts.clean-packages: rm package-lock.json && rm -r node_modules && npm i
scripts.clean-packages-all: npm run clean-packages && cd client && npm run clean-packages
scripts.clean-docker-packages: sudo docker-compose down ; sudo docker rm -f $(sudo docker ps -a -q) ; sudo docker volume rm $(sudo docker volume ls -q) ; sudo docker-compose build --no-cache ; sudo docker-compose up
